text: Dughiar kam Kwirinius, a Sirian gumazir dapanimɨn itima, ziaba osirir dughiar faragha zuir kam oto.2:2 Dughiar kam, Romɨn gavman Israelian nguibaba bar dagh ativagha dar gari. Israelɨn nguibar ekiam, a Provins Sirian aven iti. Romɨn gavmanɨn gumaziba, me men garir atriviba dɨbora ghaze, “Sisar.”
